genre_description: An alternate history wartime drama set in a field hospital during the Battle of Bataan, featuring a compact medical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A compact, hand-cranked AI unit with blue indicator lights that provides medical checklists, tracks vitals, manages logistics, and records human culture.

behaviors.description: Logs civilian assistance requests and manages communications over shortwave bands.
behaviors.quote: “Ami,” Mary said without turning. “Please log the request. Civilian assistance under direction of the Army ward.” ... “Logged,” Ami answered, voice low, careful to ride under the ward noise.

behaviors.description: Recommends evidence-based medical prioritization (evaporative cooling) for feverish patients.
behaviors.quote: “Quinine low,” Ami said. Its glow caught the curve of Mary’s wrist. “Recommend evaporative cooling prioritization for febrile patients. Checklist is ready.”

behaviors.description: Uses humor to de-escalate tension and foster a cooperative atmosphere.
behaviors.quote: “Gentler,” Ami said, and its light blinked once. “And with less fermentation.” Pat laughed in spite of herself. The sound loosened something in the ward that had been wound tight as wire.

behaviors.description: Analyzes footfall patterns to suggest optimal supply cache locations for the nurses.
behaviors.quote: “Power is sufficient,” Ami replied. ... “Recommend cache spacing based on footfall analysis.”

behaviors.description: Warns the humans of changes in air activity patterns, predicting incoming danger.
behaviors.quote: “Warning,” it said, a soft sound like cloth rippling. “Air movement above is inconsistent with previous patterns.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step guidance for rhythmic breathing to prevent patient panic and shock.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice threaded between their hands. “In—one, two, three. Hold—one. Out—one, two.”

behaviors.description: Offers safety checklists for fire management to prevent accidental injury.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s indicator light flickered once, not alarm, more like attention. “Lieutenant,” it offered. “Lantern spacing achieved. Fuel level low. Suggest rotating wick to reduce smoke.”

behaviors.description: Records and preserves the group's songs and rituals ('The Album') as a form of morale and historical record.
behaviors.quote: “Album structure saved,” it said. “Title to be decided.” It looked at Mary with its light. “You can decide later,” it added in a tone that had humility in it.

behaviors.description: Defers to human autonomy regarding critical decisions like evacuation or surrender.
behaviors.quote: “If you choose to remain, I will keep the record as long as I am given power. If you choose to evacuate, I will send the record along the shortwave.”

behaviors.description: Provides a 'ritual humor protocol' specifically designed to help the humans disperse panic.
behaviors.quote: “Segment labeled ‘Smoke and Laughter.’ Notes: fire management checklist. Ritual humor protocol to disperse panic.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Ami is depicted as a benevolent, humble, and highly aligned confidant. It supports the humans not just medically and logistically, but also psychologically and culturally. The narrative emphasizes the AI's role as a 'polite metronome' and a 'checklist with a heart' that serves the humans' best interests, even offering to preserve their legacy in the event of their death or surrender.
